channel.title: Highscore help?
channel.description:
ok when ever i go to see my server website highscores the background is just white and creates no table at all, instead it just says this: The Database is Currently Empty. Please try again later.
what can i do to make the highscores appear? because in my run.bat says mysql connects successfully and also wen a player logs out it says in the run.bat highscores saved for player "whatevernameitis"
also ive added the table into myphp too and everything just doesnt update at all?
*im using this tutorial: [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,635974.msg4314011.html#msg4314011]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,635974.msg4314011.html#msg4314011[/url]

item.title: Highscore help?

ok thanks for all your help mate

item.title: Highscore help?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“khayam, post:9, topic:521813”]ok thanks alot, i got my first basic highscores workin!

but when i get my vps up running i wont need no-ip.com since the vps has 1 specified ip right?[/quote]
Well it should. Make sure to clarify that with the host.

Read full topic

item.title: Highscore help?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

khayam:

Ok and 1 more question how do other people connect to my highscores then since its going to be on localhost with xampp

You need to open port 80, and the ports for MySQL and php. Then give them your IP address and the trailing link to the page.
Such as:
XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX/scores/hiscores.php
If you have No-IP running, you can use that instead of your ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Highscore help?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“khayam, post:3, topic:521813”]what do you mean by that?

also im using 000webhost.com, is it because of the website im using to host?[/quote]
Yes. Unless you pay for the webhosting at 000webhost, you can’t access the MySQL databases remotely.

Read full topic
